lead_paragraph: The government in Mozambique has said it will investigate allegations that security forces carried out abuses that are blamed for the flight of thousands of Mozambicans to neighboring Malawi.

headline.main: Mozambique to Probe Allegations of Abuses by Security Forces
headline.print_headline: Mozambique to Probe Allegations of Abuses by Security Forces

snippet: The government in Mozambique has said it will investigate allegations that security forces carried out abuses that are blamed for the flight of thousands of Mozambicans to neighboring Malawi.
